136 inline int CEdgeLine::GetSegmentsCount() const
137 {

139 }

172 // protected methods
173 
174 inline void CEdgeLine::EnsureVolatileValid() const
175 {
176  if (!m_areVolatileValid){
177  CalcVolatile();
178 
179  m_areVolatileValid = true;
180  }
181 }
